text: In the Jungle lived a long time ago a Fabulist whose critics met one day and visited him to complain about him (joyously pretending that they were not speaking for themselves but for others), on the basis that his criticisms were not born of good intention but of hatred. As he agreed, they withdrew running, as the time the Cigar decided and told the Ant everything she had to say. FIN
title: El fabulista y sus críticos
author: Augusto Monterroso
